means: 容易的，要求不高的，不严格的

sentence.Network_en: Over a tenth of the population have secure, undemanding jobs.
sentence.Network_cn: 超过1/10的人口拥有稳定且相对轻松的工作。

sentence.Network_en: The book is an enjoyable and undemanding read.
sentence.Network_cn: 该书妙趣横生轻松易读。

sentence.Network_en: She was easy and undemanding and always had a quick reply.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是不苛求的,并且总是能迅速回应.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U1)|无忧教育 ... undelivered 未被释放的 undemanding 容易的 undemonstrable 无法证明的.
要求高的的英文|要求高的是什么意思... ... 要求高的工作 ： demanding position 要求不高的 ： undemanding 要求高的 ： demanding.
they have progressed quickly thanks to government support and undemanding cost-conscious consumers .他们如此快速的发展，得益于政府的支持与低要求，只注重售价的消费者。
Their schedule continues to be undemanding the rest of this week ., 这周剩余的日程继续比较轻松.

list.abs: She was easy and undemanding and always had a quick reply ., 她是不苛求的 , 并且总是能迅速回应.
be more at home with fairly undemanding relief ., 更擅长处理比较简单的浮雕.
Someone Put Your Hand Out翻译 -... ... I just think about it 我仅仅把它（表白）放在脑子里 I'm so undemanding 我要求不高.
the pay was adequate and the job undemanding ; simple undemanding affection ; an undemanding boss ., 薪水不错 , 工作也容易 ; 简单的 , 要求不高的爱情 ; 要求不苛刻的老板.

entry.tran: （工作等）要求不高的，不费心的
entry.def: If you describe something such as a job as undemanding, you mean that it does not require you to work very hard or to think a great deal about it.

example.ex: Over a tenth of the population have secure, undemanding jobs...
example.tran: 超过1/10的人口拥有稳定且相对轻松的工作。

example.ex: The book is an enjoyable and undemanding read.
example.tran: 该书妙趣横生轻松易读。

entry.def: If you describe someone as undemanding, you mean they are easy to be with and do not ask other people to do a great deal for them.

means.word_mean: 1. not demanding; requiring little if any patience or effort or skill;

sentences.sentence: "the pay was adequate and the job undemanding"

auth_sentence.content: Much of this is simply undemanding and undistinguished.
auth_sentence.res_content: Much of this is simply undemanding and undistinguished.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Much of this is simply undemanding and undistinguished.

auth_sentence.content: They were pretty much the preserve of undemanding male audiences.
auth_sentence.res_content: They were pretty much the preserve of undemanding male audiences.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were pretty much the preserve of undemanding male audiences.

auth_sentence.content: Eye candy - Visual images that are superficially attractive and entertaining but intellectually undemanding.
auth_sentence.res_content: Eye candy - Visual images that are superficially attractive and entertaining but intellectually undemanding.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Eye candy - Visual images that are superficially attractive and entertaining but intellectually undemanding.
